scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kyoufuu All Back' (Strong Wind All Back).
Transition and introduction for the next performance.

subtitles.original: って思いました
subtitles.english: ...is what I thought.

subtitles.original: 観察者へ なくなれば
subtitles.english: To the observers, if I disappear...

subtitles.original: あったかいのに
subtitles.english: ...even though it's warm.

subtitles.original: ずっと座りたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep sitting forever.

subtitles.original: って思いました
subtitles.english: ...is what I thought.

subtitles.original: いないいない と外出たら
subtitles.english: I thought I was safe, but when I stepped outside...

subtitles.original: ハトハトハトハト 大乱舞
subtitles.english: Pigeons, pigeons, pigeons, pigeons, a wild dance!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと出た瞬間終わったわ
subtitles.english: Ah, the moment I stepped out, it was over.

subtitles.original: 天気はいいのに進めない
subtitles.english: The weather is nice, but I can't move forward.

subtitles.original: 風強すぎてお亡くなり
subtitles.english: The wind is too strong, I'm done for.

subtitles.original: 定期定期的にオールバック
subtitles.english: My hair keeps getting blown back periodically.

subtitles.original: 今年もみんなありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for this year too!

subtitles.original: 来年のホロライブも勢いは
subtitles.english: Next year's Hololive's momentum too...

subtitles.original: 止まらねーぜ！
subtitles.english: ...won't stop!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと出た瞬間終わったわ
subtitles.english: Ah, the moment I stepped out, it was over.

subtitles.original: 天気はいいのに進めない
subtitles.english: The weather is nice, but I can't move forward.

subtitles.original: 風強すぎてお亡くなり
subtitles.english: The wind is too strong, I'm done for.

subtitles.original: 定期定期的にオールバック
subtitles.english: My hair keeps getting blown back periodically.

subtitles.original: ちょっと出た瞬間終わったわ
subtitles.english: The moment I stepped out, it was over.

subtitles.original: 天気はいいのに進めない
subtitles.english: The weather is nice, but I can't move forward.

subtitles.original: 風強すぎてお亡くなり
subtitles.english: The wind is too strong, I'm done for.

subtitles.original: 定期定期的にオールバック
subtitles.english: My hair keeps getting blown back periodically.

subtitles.original: 髪の毛 強風 オールバック
subtitles.english: Hair, strong wind, all back.

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: Shaking up the media with an invincible smile,

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: I want to know that secret, it's so mysterious.

subtitles.original: 抜けてるとこさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her flaws are part of her territory,

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: A perfect, lying version of you...

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: ...is a genius idol.

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today?

subtitles.original: 好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you go out to play, where would you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything.

subtitles.original: それは内緒
subtitles.english: That's a secret.

subtitles.original: 何を聴かれてものらりくらり
subtitles.english: No matter what I'm asked, I'll dodge the question.

subtitles.original: そう淡々と
subtitles.english: So nonchalantly,

subtitles.original: だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: yet brilliantly.

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: A secret that's almost visible is the taste of honey.

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: That's not it, no, no.

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: This isn't it either, no, no.

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？
subtitles.english: What's your type?

subtitles.original: 相手は？さあ答えて
subtitles.english: Who is it? Come on, answer.

subtitles.original: 誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ
subtitles.english: I don't really understand what it's like to love someone.

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Whether it's a lie or the truth, I can't tell.

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまた一人堕ちる
subtitles.english: One by one, they fall for those words.

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them fall in love again.

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone's gaze is captured.

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: You are the perfect and ultimate idol.

subtitles.original: 金際現れない
subtitles.english: The kind that will never appear again,

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: the reincarnation of the brightest star.

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで
subtitles.english: With that smile, with that 'I love you',

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: you captivate everyone.

subtitles.original: その瞳がその言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words...

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: even if they're lies, they're perfect love.

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special.

subtitles.original: 我々は鼻からおまけです
subtitles.english: We're just extras from the start.

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: We're just the background dancers for the star.

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のおかげなわけ
subtitles.english: Everything is thanks to her...

subtitles.original: ない、洒落臭い 妬み嫉妬なんてないわけがない
subtitles.english: Not! How annoying. There's no way I don't feel envy and jealousy.

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃないからこそ許せない
subtitles.english: This isn't just a joke, that's why it's unforgivable.

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive you if you're not perfect.

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外は認めない
subtitles.english: I won't acknowledge anyone but the strongest you.

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じあがめてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes in and worships you.

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: Truly the strongest and invincible idol.

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: No weaknesses to be found.

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: Possessing the light of the brightest star.

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: You must never show your weaknesses.

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Don't show anything they don't want to see.

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: You have to be one of a kind, no exceptions.

subtitles.original: それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: That's what true love is.

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Firing up the media with her signature smile,

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: hiding away this secret alone.

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on the lie of 'I love you'.

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: This is my own kind of love.

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: Even the flowing sweat is a beautiful aqua,

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: with ruby hidden behind these eyelids.

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing, I am Maria.

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate form of love.

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: I've never been loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したこともない
subtitles.english: nor have I ever loved anyone.

subtitles.original: そんな私の嘘がいつか本当になること
subtitles.english: But I hope that one day, my lie will become the truth.

subtitles.original: 信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe in that.

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: I'll surely get everything one day.

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I'm such a greedy idol.

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと
subtitles.english: I want to love everyone properly,

subtitles.original: ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: just as I am.

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: That's why I'll lie again today.

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Hoping that these words will one day become the truth.

subtitles.original: それでもまだ
subtitles.english: But even so...

subtitles.original: 君と君にだけは言えてない
subtitles.english: ...I haven't been able to say it to you two.
